elements.label: Relevant Help
elements.description: Sometimes something local may aid in a task. It will not be useful elsewhere.

elements.label: Undivided Attention Required
elements.description: Some Tasks require a singular focus. [This task can only be done while not doing anything else, and while doing this task, no other task can be started]

elements.label: Adventure
elements.description: An extraordinary location to explore and plunder.

elements.label: Fleeting Opportunity
elements.description: This adventure can not be returned to once I leave.
